Package io.smint.clapi.consumer.integration.core.configuration.impl

Class AuthTokenMemoryStorage

java.lang.Object
io.smint.clapi.consumer.integration.core.configuration.impl.AuthTokenMemoryStorage
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAuthTokenStorage, Provider<IAuthTokenModel>
@Singleton public class AuthTokenMemoryStorage extends Object implements IAuthTokenStorage
Stores OAuth authentication data in memory only.

Main usage of this instance might be unit tests.

    • storeAuthData

      public IAuthTokenStorage storeAuthData(IAuthTokenModel newAuthTokenData)
      Description copied from interface: IAuthTokenStorage
      Stores a new set of OAuth authentication data to be made persistent and retrieved on next call to IAuthTokenStorage.getAuthData().

      The access token should be persisted to the underlying storage. In case this storage takes a lot of IO and time (eg: database), please make use of CompletableFuture.runAsync(Runnable) and then return this on completion.

      Specified by:
      storeAuthData in interface IAuthTokenStorage
      Parameters:
      newAuthTokenData - new OAuth token data for authorization with Smint.io API server, that need to be made persistent.
      Returns:
      this to support Fluent Interface.
